changeSet.author: frolov
changeSet.sql: CREATE EVENT delete_test ON SCHEDULE EVERY 1 DAY STARTS TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL 1 HOUR) DO DELETE FROM TEST t WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATEDIFF(NOW(), t.DATE_ADDED) >= 30 AND t.test_suite_id in ( SELECT ts.id FROM TEST_SUITE ts WHERE 1 = 1 and ts.project_id in ( SELECT p.id FROM PROJECT p WHERE p.type = 'git') );

changeSet.author: frolov
changeSet.sql: CREATE EVENT delete_test_execution ON SCHEDULE EVERY 1 DAY STARTS TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE) DO DELETE FROM TEST_EXECUTION WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(), END_TIME) >= 30;
